price: E, se quiséssemos, haveríamos feito de vós anjos para vos sucederem, na terra.
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَا مِنكُم مَّلَٰٓئِكَةٗ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَخۡلُفُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaw nashāu lajaʿalnā minkum malāikatan fī al-arḍi yakhlufūna
